ygData.subject: Re: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, i have done the crafted greaves and you do have the correct item.. in fact ive done all the crafted quests so feel free to ask anything about them..
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, i have done the crafted greaves and you do have the correct item.. in fact ive done all the crafted quests so feel free to ask anything about them.. Greaves require the dark circlet and two star rubies.. (Remember DONT stack the gems) Although i was once told that stacking them still works, it wouldnt take the chance..

Wes Lobdell,
Note: I'm not a Mac person, but you have to admit, the following is funny+ACEAIQ- :) And if you don't +ACI-get+ACI- it, then I guess the media hasn't soaked it for all its worth yet after all...
Quote: +ACI-Macintosh -- we might not get everything right, but
atleast we knew the century was going to end.+ACI-

My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time
-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com' EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Friday, September 10, 1999 10:39 AM
Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Crafted Greaves


From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com

Who has actually DONE the Crafted Greaves quest? I've heard different
stories on what item you need. Some say the Silver Circlet off Drelzna, some
say a circlet off Najena, and some say one off Trazdon.

I killed Trazdon in Najena last night at got a Dark Circlet (LORE NO DROP
MAGIC ITEM) Necro Only, AC 4, -2 CHA, INT. Is this the correct item
(please only if you have 1st hand knowledge...) It could be a Circlet from
any of them could work....but I dont' wanna take the chance as there is a
couple hours of work (plus two deaths...growl...I hadden't died in 6 ot 7
levels) and 140pp in rubies at stake...heh.

And if this ISN'T the correct circlet, what's this head peice worth?
+AD4AKg-chuckle+ACo-
Thanks.
